channel.title: Black Mesa Announcement system missing in Lambda complex?
channel.description:
Hi! I didnt notice the usual messages the BMAS used to spew out on certain events (i.e. enabling reactor pumps or opening vents later on), is it a glitch or are they really absent in BMS ?
Cheers,
[COLOR='Silver']PS On a side note, marines accuracy, 'burstiness' or their sheer number in certain places (like questionable ethics hall or the entire surface tension) can be tweaked... dont know what happens on normal and easy, but hard is really hard :slight_smile:
And pls return claymore 'stair' jumping :frowning:
